IT DOES WORK!
Use the link "5071Lod" posted a few comments up to get the latest daemon tools, once downloaded and installed(and a computer restart), you need to run DT pro then click "add image" and add the .mds file, then click "add SCSI virtual driver" then click one of the "virtual devices" at the bottom and click "mount" and there you go!

Guyz . . I Just downloaded this. . and  *straight to the point*. . after random searchiung i came up with sum instructions on working with the tvm keygen. .  .well and i got it to work. the steps are as follows:

1)Install the game in watever way u want i dont care as that isnt the main issue.

2)DOnt update the game wen it asks in the autorun menu, as i cant guarantee success with game updates(havent tried)

3)Download the tvm pcm10 'keygen.http://www.nodvd.net/download/tvm-pcm2010.rar' (without quotes)

4) Press play in the autorun game menu

5) let cd check fail and u'll hav an option to Report, press dat.

6)After collection of report, when available, press view report

7)NOW CAREFULLY COPY AND PASTE WATEVER U FIND after the word HC. Copy dat entire line notthing else. . just that line.(looks like a serial code in itself)

8)Open the tvm keygen

9) paste what u copied in step 7 in place of HARDWARE ID.

10)click get key below, and u'll get a serial key.

11) In the autorun play menu, after CD check failure, You will find Activation key or sumtn like dat. Click it. Enter the key from the keygen u jus procured in step number 10, and then watch the magic




*** Follow steps carefully****
**copying of HC id in step 7 is most essential**
*If u do it ryt, everything will be fyn. 


P.S. im on widows XP, so its not a windows issue. We just bypassed it ;)

It works perfect.!

1. Use Daemon tools Pro Advanced, and in tools and preference go to advanced and check RMPS and SecuROM.
2. Mount the .mdf and install
3. Unmount and mount .mds
4. Play - and update the 1.0.4.2 patch (install)
5. Start again and play.

Doesn't matter what program you use too mount. I have tried Daemon tools, alcohol 120%, poweriso, magic iso everything works, don't need daemon tools pro. The mount isn't a problem you just did it wrong then.
